title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB: Resilience & lessons from the Oct 2025 service disruption (DAT453)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB：韧性与2025年10月服务中断的经验教训 (DAT453)
abstract: In this session, we will walk through the architecture for the Amazon DynamoDB DNS management system that triggered the service disruption on October 20, 2025. We will share the lessons that the DynamoDB team learned from this event and explain how we are using these insights to improve both DynamoDB and AWS. You will walk away with actionable knowledge that you can apply to the systems you build.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将详细介绍导致2025年10月20日服务中断的Amazon DynamoDB DNS管理系统架构。我们将分享DynamoDB团队从此次事件中学到的经验教训，并说明我们如何利用这些见解来改进DynamoDB和AWS。您将获得可应用于自己构建系统的实用知识。
